reviews.review: I mean. It's Portal 2. It took everything from the last game, improved on it, and added EVEN MORE STUFF.
Awesome. Great co-op.
if you have any dought about buying this game is here is what your answer should be. HELL YEAH
Well, I had a life once. And then came Portal. And then came Portal 2. And now I "think with portals," even in real life.
:EMOFDR::EMOFDR::EMOFDR:
Best game to play co-op to play with your friend  if you want better just wait for portal 3
If you like puzzle, BUY NOW!

Uno de los mejores juegos que he tenido el placer de jugar en mi vida. Es una mejora sustancial en las gráficas y cantidad de etapas con respecto a Portal 1, y además si quedas con gusto a poco al terminar el juego se puede acceder a las cámaras de la comunidad, las cuales te entregarán horas y horas de entretención extra.
Очень рекомендую данную игру ! Нужна логика и ум для прохождения !

انا حملت مسلسل كامل عشان بس اسمع مؤدي الصوت حق ويتلي يتكلم عادي,

ويتلي شخصية مضحكه بشكل غريب
LOVE IT!!!!!
this is one of my favorite game has a great story to it
REALLY FUN!!!
Un juego donde el pensamiento y reflejos son muy necesitados.

This game is a lot like spending a Friday night in Vegas. Lots of freaky shit happens, you try to jump in as many holes as you can, and at the end you experience one of the worst headaches in your life.

Portal 2, ein Spiel wo man den Kopf unbedingt braucht. Der Einzelspieler bringt dich in ein belustigendes und denkreiches Abenteuer, und im Multiplayer Modus, hängt ihr euch mit einem Freund in das Leben von den beiden Robotern, Atlas und P- Body und ihr werdet nie wieder beim Denken so viel Spaß haben wie bei Portal 2.
Why are you reading this review when you've got the opportunity to get this game
totally awesome! love he realistic feel to it all.

An amazing sequal to Portal, it is enjoyable whether you own Portal 1 or not. It's vast expansive scenes not only give the player an amazing visual time, but it also means you can explore where you want. Love it.
POrtal 2 é bom!

This is easliy one one the best games I've ever played. Creative and smooth gameplay, challenging and fun puzzles, interesting story, hillarious and well-developed characters, and exellent music. Must buy for everyone. 10/10

Prima di Portal 2 ho giustamente giocato al primo capitolo e sono rimasto un po' deluso per la durata eccessivamente corta della trama.
In Portal2 oltre ad avere una campagna in singleplayer che dura una decina di ore (non mi ricordo con precisione ) e che ha una trama perfetta che ti fa immergere completamente nei laboratori della Aperture hai non 1 ma due giochi a tua disposizione, mi sto riferendo alla coop. Devo dire che mi sono divertiro un mondo a giocare alla coop con il mio partner scientifico e a seguire la trama che mi ha coinvolto molto di più del singleplayer (non so il perchè).
Ottimo anche il fatto di aver tenuto i dialoghi originali e non averli tradotti e doppiati perchè non si puo sostituire la voce originale di Glados o di Cave Johnson.
10/10 compratelo e giocateci e dopo mi ringrazierete per il consiglio
Die Genialität eines Portal 1 mit der Möglichkeit eines Multiplayermodus - einfach genial! Warte sehnsüchtig auf Portal 3!
好吧，既然可说的早已经被说完了，我就只说一句好了：GLaDOS和Turret，窝爱你们！
3D眩晕
Sequel to the innovative first-person puzzle game brings a bigger story, more characters, more puzzle elements, more memes, and multiplayer.
Befriend Skynet as you unleash your inner Lara Croft puzzle solving skills to prevent C3P0 from doing what his creator intended him to do; take pictures of Spiderman.
One of the smartest games I have ever played, single player has a good story with a sarcastically-funny script and co-op has some pretty challenging tests to keep you playing for a while. 10/10
Simply the best game i have ever played. Portal 2 is a completly new experience for those who played the first game.
good

Summary: 10/10 - A Masterpiece. The campaign makes the old seem new, and the new seem old; it's a perfect sequal. 

With a masterwork campaign, well designed multiplayer, and community design support, this game deserves a place on the pedestal with the greatest games ever made.
It is visually and audibly applealing, has excellent game-feel, is reasonably challanging, and brings up the nostalgia of the original Portal without cheapening it.

This game I recommend to people who like strategy. But there is a problem. If you're not very smart, you are gonna have trouble; lots of trouble. This is a thinking man's game. It takes skill and lots of thinking to figure out what you're doing and how you are going to get past that part. If you aren't very smart, at least try and join a lobby where there actually is a smart person doing all the work for you. You can; however, get the hang of this game really quickly, so you shouldn't have too much trouble after a couple of hours of getting the hang of it. All in all, I think this game is extraordinarily fun to play with friends and you should try it out!
Llore con el final.  (I cry at the end.)
muito bom

el unico juego con uso de portales portables
EDIT: ahora existe splitgate

Гра просто шикарна! Режим самостійної гри - круто. Шукаєш рішення, виходи, думаєш... Але гра з другом, а якщо це ще й коханий.. Ух.. Просто захоплює і можна гратись годинами. Я не просто задоволена покупкою цієї гри, я рекомендую її кожному, у кого є бажання якісно відпочити і потренувати своє мишлення! Заходьте в ПОРТАЛ2 і ви не пшкодуєте!
Juegazo 9/10
Nice Game!
Absolutely stunning.  Valve really out did themselves in creating a backstore.

A little late review, as the game has been around for a long while, and heaps of people have already played/beat the game, so I shall keep this short. In fact, I'll review the game in three words: IT IS AMAZING! Get it already. Co-op is absolutely phenomenal.

Ich liebe dieses Spiel! Es macht einfach nur Spaß es zu spielen!! 
Ich hoffe das bald ein dritter Teil erschent! Würde mich freuen!
好游戏，从上到下，令我凌乱，不过起源的引擎比较好，不晕乎。剧情上貌似带了点儿hl2剧情的引子。

Fantastic gameplay! Made perfectly!
Need I say anything else?

Намного интереснее, разнообразнее и дольше первой части. Много новых возможностей.
Не пожалел, что купил.
Es el mejor juego, siempre mantiene entretenido, algo corto pero con la mejor historia, me encanta su trama, no puedo esperar a comprar el 1 <3

Such a great game and highly recommended to anyone who still hasn't gotten the chance to play through it all the way!

A great example of how puzzles and humor can be easily incorporated into the same game, while still being set in a dystopian universe where an alien species have captured and enslaved the human race.
Скажу кратко. Если вы любите головоломки, то эта игра для вас.
PUTA MIERDA BUENA PAL VICIO
Great gameplay; great puzzles; great plot; great characters; great sequel; just an overall great game really. 10/10
i think short story mode but very good playing and intelligence game
Très bon jeu, juste le prix trop cher par rapport au temps de jeu solo

Este a sido uno de los juegos mas interesantes que e jugado, al igual que en el primer portal, usas demasiado tu imaginacion y un poco de la logica para poder resolver los puzzles que se te presentan, a mi parecer este es un "must play" junto con el primero de la serie.
la historia resulta ser muy interesante, teniendo obviamente la continuacion del portal pasado, ademas de agregar aun mas horas de juego.
debes comprarlo este juego, o por lo menos pedirlo prestado para jugarlo! :D

JUST BUY IT !Why ? ok, then, you know, it's a master piece with a lot of content from the community, what else do you want, a cake ? Buy this game and play with a friend too, the coop campaign worth it as well.

Nice.

Just, wow. I mean this game is fucking awesome, an interessting story and cool stuff about it on Youtube (like songs or animations). The coop mode is very cool and fun to play with a friend. One of the best games i've ever played, seriously...
Co-op makes it even more fun than the original and I love the humor of the bots we control and of course GLaDOS.

V社又一烧脑神作，趁着去年年底冰点的时候入的，非常非常非常非常好玩~
初次玩这类游戏的话，单人流程都足够你玩上一整天，更何况里面还有丰富的多人模式。

2 kişiyseniz ve bulmaca yada gizemi seviyorsunuz bu oyunu almanızı tavsiye ederim. Oyunda çözülecek bir çok gizem ve bulmaca var. Zaten bölümleride bulmacaları çözerek ilerliyorsunuz. Kısacası beyin egzersizi yapmak için ideal bir oyun.

Assim como no primeiro portal, outro jogo que faz o jogador pensar pra caramba, chega a ficar mais de meia hora travado em uma simples fase. uhahuauh. Muito bom, além de que é uma sequencia direta do primeiro jogo!
I NEVER HAD THIS GAME 8/8 GREAT B8 M8

De retour chez Aperture Science pour une nouvelle aventure et toujours dans la peau de la délicieuse Chell...

Un mode coopératif vraiment original fait son apparition, mais ce n'est pas la seule innovation.

Des gels rebondissant, accélérant et permettant de placer des portails sur des surfaces auparavant inaccessibles mais aussi des ponts de lumière et des cubes réflecteurs seront aussi de la partie.

Vous avez aimé Portal, vous aimerez encore plus ce deuxième opus.

After you played Portal 1 and blood started dripping from your nose, you thought "I want more."

Well, Portal 2 is about.... six times bigger.

Oh, and... there is no cake. The cake is a lie.
If you're in anyway interested in puzzles or have a sense of humor, you will like this game
My brain hurts after playing this game. 10/10 would play again.
Portal 2 is a very well thought out puzzle game.  I have enjoyed all of the singleplayer and multiplayer campaign.  The added ability to create your own test chambers is amazing.

Одно из лучших творений игровой индустрии. Проста на первый взгляд - поставь один портал, потом другой и готово. Но с углублением в неё поражаешься, как эта "простота" затягивает. Порой ты не знаешь куда и как идти, но дойдя – радость на душе, пока не вспомнишь, что ты испытуемый и впереди «смертельная опасность». Молчаливый герой, разговаривают с тобой только два персонажа, а также записки учёного-революционера,  турели ищущие тебя повсюду. 
Возможность кооперативной игры, создания своих карт - делает игру ещё лучше во всех отношениях.
10/10 fett najs

Bhe che dire,è Portal 2,un gioco bellissimo. La storia,le interazioni,il level design,tutto bellissimo. Dopo aver giocato un po,ti rendi conto di quasi "tenere" ai personaggi,e li comprendi. Sono sicuro che la Valve non mi deluderà con Portal 3 e HF3
Herkeze Tavsiye Ediyorum Oyun Sayesinde Beyin Kastım :D

11/10

Se il primo Portal era un piccolo gioiello, Portal 2 supera tutte le aspettative. Il gameplay del predecessore è arricchito di nuove sfide e meccaniche, e non annoia mai. Il tutto condito da una storia fenomenale ed appassionante. Ne voglio ancora!
It is a Portal game, of course it is good.

Continuó y mejoró lo que hizo Portal 1.
Ambientación increible, como era de esperar, doblaje bueno, pero en VO es único.
Puzzles divertidos y Glados la puta ama, como siempre.
The great gameplay from the original Portal, with added mechanics that enchance the puzzles. The story isn't as tight as the original, but still this is one of the best games out there.
